channel.title: Big help pleasE!
channel.description:
Im wanting this...
Like when someone says ::save before they log out or when they log out it saved their attack and all their other skills to a notepad and when i open the notepad it will say this... i want it to save their xp like this
[code]Man2322 Attack - 34442 Strength - 93431 Defence - 23211 Hitpoints - 23422 AND ALL THE OTHER SKILS Girl3834 Attack - 23223 Strength - 23232 Defence - 9933 ETC...[/code]
PLEASE POST

item.title: Big help pleasE!
item.dc:creator: @jcrane164 jcrane164
item.description:
@jcrane164 wrote:

dude ur code does not work idc what u say

BufferedWriter lol = null; try { lol = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("noob.txt", true)); bw.write(playerName); for(int i = 0; i < 20; i++) { bw.write(playerLevel[i]+"-"+getXPForLevel(playerLevel[i])); bw.newLine(); } bw.write("---------------"); bw.flush(); } catch(Exception ex) { System.out.println("Shit, "+ex); } finally { if(bw != null) { try { bw.close(); } catch(Exception e) { System.out.println("Shit, "+e); } } }
DOES NOT WORK!!! IF IT DOES WHERE DO I PUT IT … I ADDED A VOID ABOVE IT AND THEN PUT IT IN THE VOID’S AND DIDNT WORK…

Read full topic
